nodes.html: Check out our new preprint Warp Consistency for Unsupervised Learning of Dense Correspondences!
Our paper Learning Accurate Dense Correspondences and When to Trust Them (PDC-Net) was accepted at CVPR 2021 as an ORAL !
Our paper GOCor: Bringing Globally Optimized Correspondence Volumes into Your Neural Network was accepted at NeurIPS 2020 !
We just released a new pre-print GOCor. Code will be released soon here !
I started my PhD at the Computer Vision Lab of Prof. Luc Van Gool.
Our paper GLU-Net got accepted to CVPR 2020 for oral presentation ! Check out the code !
My first paper GLAMpoints was accepted at ICCV 2019. Check out the code !
I started my master thesis at the Computer Vision Lab of Prof. Luc Van Gool, supervised by Dr. Martin Danelljan and Dr. Radu Timofte.
I started a 6-months internship in RetinAI, a start-up focused on computer vision applied to opthalmology.
